verses.roman:
khāite śuite yathā tathā nāma laya
kāla-deśa-niyama nāhi, sarva siddhi haya

synonyms: khāite—eating; śuite—lying down; yathā—as; tathā—so; nāma laya—one takes the holy name; kāla—in time; deśa—in place; niyama—regulation; nāhi—there is not; sarva siddhi haya—there is all perfection.
translation: "Regardless of time or place, one who chants the holy name, even while eating or sleeping, attains all perfection.
